casebody.data:
JPMORGAN CHASE BANK, N.A.
v.
J. Maurice HERMAN Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 15, 2017

Liam M. West, Stamford, in support of the petition.

Kelley Franco Throop, New Canaan, Matthew Triggs and Lisa Markofsky, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 662, 168 A.3d 514 (2017), is denied.
